Class CourseManager

  • Object
    • CourseManager

  • public class CourseManager
extends Object
    Manages the adding and dropping of courses
    Author:
    Weiyao

      String dropCourseGroup(String index, String matric)
      Drop student from course group if there are students in the waitlist, enrol the first student from waiting list and return the matriculation number of this student This is so that we can add the course to the student using studentmanager later And send an email to the waitlist student to inform them.

      • enrol

        public boolean enrol(String matricNumber,
                     String index)
        Enrols student into a course group
      • Returns boolean telling the user if the coursemanager enrolled successfully
Returns:
false: student wasn't enrolled successfully into the course (student is in waitlist)
  • true: student was successfully enrolled

    • getSwapsForStudent

      public ArrayList<String[]> getSwapsForStudent(String matricNumber)
      Returns swaps relevant to the student in ["fromIndex toIndex", [senderMatricNumber, receiverMatricNumber]] form This is used for displaying what swaps the student can accept
      Returns:
      swaps relevant to the student

    • dropCourseGroup

      public String dropCourseGroup(String index,
                              String matric)
      Drop student from course group
    • if there are students in the waitlist, enrol the first student from waiting list and return the matriculation number of this student
    • This is so that we can add the course to the student using studentmanager later
    • And send an email to the waitlist student to inform them.
    Parameters:
    index - : index to drop
    matric - : matric number of student dropping out
    Returns:
    null: if there is no waitlist student added
  • waitlist student matrciculation number, if there is a waitlist student added

    • addSwap

      public void addSwap(String courseFromID,
                    String courseToID,
                    String matric1,
                    String matric2)
      Adds a new swap Assumes that all courseIDs are valid and all matriculation numbers are valid
      Parameters:
      courseFromID - : coure group index to swap from (from sender's perspective)
      courseToID - : course group index to swap to (from sender's perspective)
      matric1 - : matriculation number of sender
      matric2 - : matriculation number of receiver

    • isClashing

      public boolean isClashing(String currentCourseGroupIndex,
                          String newCourseGroupIndex)
      Checks if 2 course groups have clashing lessons
      Parameters:
      currentCourseGroupIndex -
      newCourseGroupIndex -
      Returns:
      true: these 2 course groups have at least 1 lesson which clashes
    • false: these 2 course groups do not have any lesson clashes
